roleset.name: havnig an abundance of fat; full
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. relation to fatten.01.

example.name: arg1
example.text: My husband is very fat but he is a nice guy . He works at the railway department but is truly a good person .

example.name: both args
example.text: Oreo suit twists legal system, is fat with faults
